thread.title: Eva Mendes Supports Ryan Gosling at SXSW
thread.title_full: Eva Mendes Supports Ryan Gosling at SXSW

author: Desiree Murphy
title: Eva Mendes Supports Ryan Gosling at SXSW
text: Eva Mendes Supports Ryan Gosling at SXSW by Desiree Murphy 1:40 PM PST, March 11, 2017 Photo: Getty Images Eva Mendes is supporting her beau! It appears the 43-year-old actress attended the Austin, Texas, premiere of Ryan Gosling's new film, Song to Song , during the South by Southwest film festival on Friday. Gosling, 36, looked smashing at the event, donning a navy blue suit and white dress shirt. Photo: Getty Images And although Mendes didn't join Gosling on the red carpet, she took to Instagram to share a snap of the Paramount Theatre, where the Terrence Malik-directed drama premiered. ‚ù§ A post shared by Eva Mendes (@evamendes) on Mar 10, 2017 at 6:11pm PST Earlier this month, pictures were released from the Miami, Florida, native's photo shoot with SHAPE . Inside the magazine, Mendes opened up about life at home with Gosling and their two kids, daughters Esmeralda, 2, and Amada, 11 months. "What people don't know about me is that I love being home," she explained. "Instead of hitting the red carpet, I'd rather be with our girls." Hear more (and see the stunning pics!) in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
